subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mets Vice President Jeff Wilpon said Wednesday that he would have no problem with Guillermo Mota’s serving as one of the faces of the Mets while he is suspended. Mota was absent from a charity event on Thursday.
snippet: Mets Vice President Jeff Wilpon said Wednesday that he would have no problem with Guillermo Mota’s serving as one of the faces of the Mets while he is suspended. Mota was absent from a charity event on Thursday.
